tool_description: Identifies trending content based on platform activity metrics including view counts, user engagement, and velocity of popularity growth.

platform_activity_data.description: Activity metrics for content items over time

time_window_hours.description: Time window for trend detection (1-168 hours)

trending_threshold.description: Minimum activity increase rate to consider trending

error_messages: Invalid platform_activity_data: Activity data must contain valid content metrics.
Invalid time_window_hours: Must be between 1 and 168 hours (1 week).
Invalid trending_threshold: Must be greater than 1.0.
Insufficient activity data: Not enough data points to detect trending patterns.
usage: Provide platform_activity_data array with content metrics. Set time_window_hours for trend detection period and trending_threshold for sensitivity. Returns trending content list.

trending_content_ids.description: Content IDs identified as currently trending

trend_scores.description: Trending intensity scores for each identified content

trend_categories.description: Trend categories: viral, rising, steady, or declining

detection_timestamp.description: Timestamp when trend detection was performed
